item.title: How do i move the shops PLEASE HELP!?
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Dude, if you use common sense, you would of figured out that NPC’S (the ones you spawned?) are the shops… The client and npchandler bit just link it to the NPC, so moving the npc = moving the shops…
